sections.text:
1-118.Certified public accountant; reexamination; waiting period.

(1) The board may by rule and regulation prescribe the terms and conditions under which a person who does not pass the examination may be reexamined. The board may also provide by rule and regulation for a reasonable waiting period for reexamination.

(2) A person shall be entitled to any number of reexaminations under section 1-114 subject to the rules and regulations of the board.

SourceLaws 1957, c. 1, § 13, p. 59;Laws 1976, LB 619, § 4;Laws 1984, LB 473, § 8;Laws 1991, LB 75, § 7;Laws 1997, LB 114, § 15;Laws 2003, LB 214, § 2;Laws 2009, LB31, § 8;Laws 2016, LB853, § 2.
